text: Best veal in the area Great food great service Good for family Meals or romantic dinners Our favourite Italian place for years!

The food served is quite basic and not interesting. You buy canned ingredients in the super market and do the same thing. The pizza is is alright. I wouldn't recommend this restaurant. It is not authentic nor is it worth the price.
Très bon restaurant italien. Les pizza cuite au four à bois sont un must a cet endroit. C'est aussi là qu'on trouve la meilleure sauce bolognaise. Cette endroit est à essayer !
